@graph.name: Easy Blueberry Muffin Overnight Oats - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: These easy Blueberry Muffin Overnight Oats are a fun and delicious vegan breakfast that is easy to make ahead of time - perfect for a busy morning!

@graph.name: Blueberry Muffins Overnight Oats Vegan
@graph.description: These easy homemade Blueberry Muffins Overnight Oats are for all lovers of blueberry cakes and lemon blueberry muffins! A fun and delicious dessert-inspired vegan breakfast that is easy to make ahead of time - perfect for a busy morning! Gluten-free, oilfree, Nutfree option
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp sugar (or maple or another sweetener of choice)
1 Cup Old Fashioned Rolled Oats (, Certified gluten-free if needed)
1 1/2 cups Warm Non-Dairy Milk (Such as almond, oat, soy, light coconut milk )
1 tbsp sugar (or maple syrup or sweetener of choice)
chopped roasted nuts or seeds of choice

recipeInstructions.text: To make the Blueberry Compote,combine all the Blueberry Compote ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Mash the Blueberries, and continue to cook until tender and the mixture thickens a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the Blueberry Compote,combine all the Blueberry Compote ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Mash the Blueberries, and continue to cook until tender and the mixture thickens a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture sit and cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture sit and cool.

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate bowl, combine the Oats, Chia Seeds, Warmed non Dairy Milk, Lemon Zest, Vanilla Extract, and 1 tbsp of sweetener of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: In a separate bowl, combine the Oats, Chia Seeds, Warmed non Dairy Milk, Lemon Zest, Vanilla Extract, and 1 tbsp of sweetener of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and chill for 15 minutes. This will help thicken the mixture, so that it's easier to pour into your overnight jars. (If it hasn’t thickened to preference, add in 1-3 tbsp more oats and a tsp or so more chia seeds and let sit again)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and chill for 15 minutes. This will help thicken the mixture, so that it's easier to pour into your overnight jars. (If it hasn’t thickened to preference, add in 1-3 tbsp more oats and a tsp or so more chia seeds and let sit again)

recipeInstructions.text: Pour your compote into 2 or 3 jars, depending on the size.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour your compote into 2 or 3 jars, depending on the size.

recipeInstructions.text: Distribute your oat mixture into the jars.
recipeInstructions.name: Distribute your oat mixture into the jars.

recipeInstructions.text: Top them with Blueberries, or other berries of choice, and some chopped roasted walnuts, pecans, pumpkin seeds, hemp seeds, or chia seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Top them with Blueberries, or other berries of choice, and some chopped roasted walnuts, pecans, pumpkin seeds, hemp seeds, or chia seeds.

@graph.keywords: blueberry muffin overnight oats, blueberry oatmeal, overnight oats recipe, vegan overnight oats
